thread.title: Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I-85 Provides Comfortable Lodging for Morehouse College Homecoming
thread.title_full: Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I-85 Provides Comfortable Lodging for Morehouse College Homecoming - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I-85 Provides Comfortable Lodging for Morehouse College Homecoming
text:
Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I-85 offers comfortable lodging for Morehouse College Homecoming October 18-25.
 ATLANTA, GA, October 16, Alumni and fans attending Morehouse College Homecoming will find comfortable lodging at the Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport hotel North I-85. Homecoming festivities will run from October 18-25 and will include class reunions, a golf tournament, parade, and Greek Step Show. Morehouse will play Benedict College in the Homecoming game on October 24. Kickoff is scheduled for 2pm.
"We are happy to welcome Morehouse alumni, families, and football fans for Homecoming," shares Vincent Thomas, the new General Manager of the Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I-85. "Our hotel offers comfortable and convenient accommodations just minutes from campus," continues Thomas.
This non-smoking Hartsfield hotel received the 2015 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence Award. Guests will enjoy free high speed Internet and Hampton Clean and Fresh Beds . An in-room microwave and mini refrigerator are an added convenience for travelers. Property amenities include a business center, fitness room, and seasonal outdoor pool. Hampton's On the House Breakfast, with hot waffle station, is complimentary. Guests with limited time may choose an On the Run Breakfast Bag on weekday mornings. Real time flight information for Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport is displayed on the Flight Board in the hotel lobby. This ATL Airport hotel provides complimentary shuttle service to the airport terminals and the Airport MARTA Station. Downtown Atlanta is just a few minutes away by MARTA train.
Current lodging specials at the Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I-85 include the Weekend Getaway Package with late checkout. HHonors members can earn triple points Friday-Sunday nights through December 31, 2015. AAA, senior, and military rates are available.
 about Morehouse College 2015 Homecoming activities, visit www.morehouse.edu/homecoming/ . To book your stay at Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I-85, call 404-767-9300 or visit www.AIRPORTHAMPTONINN.com .
About Hampton Inn & Ste Atlanta Airport North I-85
The Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport Hotel is just north of Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport and just southwest of downtown Atlanta. The hotel is two and a half miles from the Georgia International Convention Center, four miles from Atlanta Expo Center, and 15 miles from Six Flags Over Georgia. Other nearby attractions include the Georgia Aquarium, World of Coca-Cola , Underground Atlanta, CNN Center, Georgia Dome and Georgia World Congress Center--all less than 10 miles away from the hotel. The Atlanta Airport hotel also offers a broad range of services and amenities to make its guest's stay exceptional.
 visit: http://www.AIRPORTHAMPTONINN.COM
